Text:
Is there a way to set the bandwidth usage of uTorrent so as not to exceed the monthly cap?  My service was temporaily disconnected to warn me of past usage.  I dont want to leech, but if there is no other way, I can't risk having my service getting cut because then I wont be able to seed anyway.

Any thoughts or youtube links?
upgrade 2 unlimited or change your supplier
Use the transfer cap under the preferences or use the scheduler to have the program only run during certain periods of the day

to some-young-guy go to you tube and search utorrent faster download speed this help you out.
i would comment more but each time i do 1 a week says im posting comments to fast slow down? wtf?
